short_summary: Temporary Help Services (THS) - Professional and Technical
description: Temporary Help Services (THS) - Professional and Technical
full_summary:
Temporary Help Resources (up to 10) in Computer Application Support for the Service Delivery and Support Division (SIS)
================================================ȊPEěř.sk reminder of the call for proposals. A clear and concise description of the services provided by the Service Delivery and Support Division (SIS) and the services required is essential to this call for proposals.

### Title

Temporary Help Resources (up to 10) in Computer Application Support for the Service Delivery and Support Division (SIS)

### Reference Number

23-231382

### Tender Closing Date

14:00 (EST) on January 3, 2023

### Brief Description

This call for proposals is for temporary help resources in computer application support to assist with various IT projects, including Microsoft Windows upgrades and smartphone upgrades.

### Details of the Requirement

*   A maximum of ten senior computer application support resources are required
*   The contract duration is from the award of the contract to up to 48 weeks later
*   The estimated delivery date is January 31, 2024
*   The incumbent, Altis Human Resources Inc, has held the contract since September 1, 2021

### Goods and Services Information

*   GSIN: R201BA
*   NIBS Description: Temporary Help Services - Professional and Technical

### Security Requirement

The contract will be subject to the Canada Class Reliability Protocol, Common Level Security 34 (CL-34)

### Trade Agreement

Multiple trade agreements apply to this procurement, including:

*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Atlantic Procurement Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

The region of opportunity for this procurement is the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Authority

*
